text: Chase Claypool (born July 7, 1998) is a Canadian professional American football wide receiver for the Miami Dolphins of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Notre Dame and was drafted by the Pittsburgh Steelers in the second round of the 2020 NFL Draft. title: Chase Claypool
